title: Dark Matter: Game Music & Loop Pack
description: The Dark Matter Music & Loop Pack contains 54 professionally composed, produced, and mastered music files and seamless loops, with over 25 minutes of cinematic, ticking tension music in three different tempos!
longDescription:
Excellent music and underscore for games and apps in the fantasy, ambient, spy, thriller, and sci-fi genres. Listen to a sampler here: https://soundcloud.com/user-512388516/dark-matter-sci_fifantasy-music-loop-pack-for-video-game-developers_album-sampler

Composed in the style of famous Hollywood film composers with ticking clocks and eerie drones and undertones to create uneasiness. Dark and brooding, pulsing tracks that raise the tension and dramatic elements of your game!Â ALL ROYALTY-FREE AND READY TO USE IN YOUR PROJECT!


Contains a variety of loop lengths and layers, as well as full mixes for trailers and promotion of your project, in 3 main tempos:


Original Tempo to create tension! - 18 tracks and loops

Slow Tempo to darken the mood! - 18 tracks and loops

Fast Tempo to quicken the pace of action! - 18 tracks and loops


My music appears in over 1,000 episodes of television shows all around the world, and over 200 video games!

IMDB: https://www.imdb.com/name/nm6277420/

https://www.taris-studios.com
